Description.Details: Tall, squat, and using four treads, the Demolisher has a well-earned reputation as one of the most deadly vehicles on the battlefield. Designed to counteract the increasing scarcity of 'Mechs during the Succession Wars, the Demolisher became popular, especially on worlds where BattleMechs were not available. The Demolisher is armed with two AC/20s, which are enough to make any other unit, 'Mechs included, pause. The relatively short range of the guns means that manoeuvrable units with long-range weaponry can confound the Demolisher. It utilizes 10 tons of armor for protection, and the I.C.E. motor allows for a cruising speed 32.4kph. Tracked: High traction, agile turning. ICE: Air breathing Combustion Engine. This unit can not deploy in thin atmosphere. Movement: 3/5 Hex: 90/150 Meters. Armor: Armor Structure: Structure Values A S Front 200 40 Left 150 40 Right 150 40 Rear 100 40 Turret 200 40 Total 800 200
Description.Name: Demolisher Heavy Tank

YangsThoughts: It's a tank, Boss, they all look the same to me.
